channel.title: Umm a little help?! 317 server
channel.description: Hey guys im trying to make a 317 server and it being a pain idk if its the source or the client but i got em bolth off here could u guys tell me how to add npc's and add and put items in shops?

item.title: Umm a little help?! 317 server
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

First of all you need to know exactly what your gonna put in. then

first you need to go to client.java, search wanneshop and paste this code in

if (NPCID == 731) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 8;//bartender }

if (NPCID == (npcid) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = (shop number);//bartender }
next we need to spawn the npc, so go to your source files, and click config, then click autospawn.cfg, then you need to post an autospawn code like this.

spawn = 89	2603	4773	0	2419	4705	2415	4701	1
spawn = (npc ID)	(Xcord)	(Ycord)	0	2419	4705	2415	4701	1

warning: has to stay in that format, lastly go into your shops.cfg, under config folder and add the shop.

shop = 8	Land's End Tavern			2	0	1917	100	1917	100	1907	100	1907	100	6962	100	6965	100
shop = (shop number)	(shop name)			2	0	(item id to sell)	(quantity)	(item id to sell)	(quantity)	1907	100	1907	100	6962	100	6965	100

make sure to keep it in format.

Read full topic
